trans-unit.source: Configure and register your device
trans-unit.target: Configure and register your device

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure and register a StorSimple device that is running Update 1.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure and register a StorSimple device that is running Update 1.

trans-unit.source: To configure and register the device
trans-unit.target: To configure and register the device

trans-unit.source: Access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.
trans-unit.target: Access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.

trans-unit.source: See [Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console) for instructions.
trans-unit.target: See [Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console) for instructions.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to follow the procedure exactly or you will not be able to access the console.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to follow the procedure exactly or you will not be able to access the console.

trans-unit.source: In the session that opens up, press Enter one time to get a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: In the session that opens up, press Enter one time to get a command prompt.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted to choose the language that you would like to set for your device.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted to choose the language that you would like to set for your device.

trans-unit.source: Specify the language, and then press Enter.
trans-unit.target: Specify the language, and then press Enter.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple configure and register device 1
trans-unit.target: StorSimple configure and register device 1

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu that is presented, choose option 1 to log on with full access.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu that is presented, choose option 1 to log on with full access.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple register device 2
trans-unit.target: StorSimple register device 2

trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to configure the minimum required network settings for your device.

trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] These configuration steps need to be performed on the active controller of the device.

trans-unit.target: The serial console menu indicates the controller state in the banner message.

trans-unit.source: If you are not connect to the active controller, disconnect and then connect to the active controller.
trans-unit.target: If you are not connect to the active controller, disconnect and then connect to the active controller.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type your password.
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type your password.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, run `Get-HcsUpdateAvailability`.
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, run `Get-HcsUpdateAvailability`.

trans-unit.source: You should be notified that updates are available.
trans-unit.target: You should be notified that updates are available.

trans-unit.source: Run `Start-HcsUpdate`.
trans-unit.target: Run `Start-HcsUpdate`.

trans-unit.source: You can run this command on any node.
trans-unit.target: You can run this command on any node.

trans-unit.source: Updates will be applied on the first controller, the controller will fail over, and then the updates will be applied on the other controller.
trans-unit.target: Updates will be applied on the first controller, the controller will fail over, and then the updates will be applied on the other controller.

trans-unit.source: You can monitor the progress of the update by running `Get-HcsUpdateStatus`.
trans-unit.target: You can monitor the progress of the update by running `Get-HcsUpdateStatus`.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.

trans-unit.target: It may take up to 11 hours to apply all the updates, including the Windows Updates.

trans-unit.target: Resume setup wizard

trans-unit.target: When you resume setup, the wizard will be the Update 1 version (which corresponds to version 17469).

trans-unit.source: Accept the network settings.
trans-unit.target: Accept the network settings.

trans-unit.source: You will see a validation message after you accept each setting.
trans-unit.target: You will see a validation message after you accept each setting.

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, the device administrator password expires after the first session, and you will need to change it now.
trans-unit.target: For security reasons, the device administrator password expires after the first session, and you will need to change it now.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, provide a device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, provide a device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: A valid device administrator password must be between 8 and 15 characters.
trans-unit.target: A valid device administrator password must be between 8 and 15 characters.

trans-unit.source: The password must contain three of the following: lowercase, uppercase, numeric, and special characters.
trans-unit.target: The password must contain three of the following: lowercase, uppercase, numeric, and special characters.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple register device 5
trans-unit.target: StorSimple register device 5

trans-unit.source: The final step in the setup wizard registers your device with the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: The final step in the setup wizard registers your device with the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: For this, you will need the service registration key that you obtained in [Step 2: Get the service registration key](storsimple-get-service-registration-key-gov.md).
trans-unit.target: For this, you will need the service registration key that you obtained in [Step 2: Get the service registration key](storsimple-get-service-registration-key-gov.md).

trans-unit.source: After you supply the registration key, you may need to wait for 2-3 minutes before the device is registered.
trans-unit.target: After you supply the registration key, you may need to wait for 2-3 minutes before the device is registered.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can press Ctrl + C at any time to exit the setup wizard.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can press Ctrl + C at any time to exit the setup wizard.

trans-unit.source: If you have entered all the network settings (IP address for Data 0, Subnet mask, and Gateway), your entries will be retained.
trans-unit.target: If you have entered all the network settings (IP address for Data 0, Subnet mask, and Gateway), your entries will be retained.

trans-unit.target: StorSimple registration progress

trans-unit.source: After the device is registered, a Service Data Encryption key will appear.
trans-unit.target: After the device is registered, a Service Data Encryption key will appear.

trans-unit.source: Copy this key and save it in a safe location.
trans-unit.target: Copy this key and save it in a safe location.

trans-unit.source: This key will be required with the service registration key to register additional devices with the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: This key will be required with the service registration key to register additional devices with the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Refer to [StorSimple security](../articles/storsimple/storsimple-security.md) for more information about this key.
trans-unit.target: Refer to [StorSimple security](../articles/storsimple/storsimple-security.md) for more information about this key.

trans-unit.target: StorSimple register device 7

trans-unit.target: Return to the Government Portal, and complete the following steps:

trans-unit.target: Click **View connected devices**.

trans-unit.target: On the **Devices** page, verify that the device has successfully connected to the service by looking up the status.

trans-unit.target: The device status should be **Online**.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Devices page
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Devices page

trans-unit.source: If the device status is **Offline**, wait for a couple of minutes for the device to come online.
trans-unit.target: If the device status is **Offline**, wait for a couple of minutes for the device to come online.

trans-unit.source: If the device is still offline after a few minutes, then you need to make sure that your firewall network was configured as described in the [network requirements for your StorSimple device](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn772371.aspx).
trans-unit.target: If the device is still offline after a few minutes, then you need to make sure that your firewall network was configured as described in the [network requirements for your StorSimple device](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn772371.aspx).
